column7: Using etree to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace etree with the equivalent defusedxml package.
Using ElementMaker to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace ElementMaker with the equivalent defusedxml package.
